# System Design & Architecture - Sequence Diagram
![System Design & Architecture - Sequence Diagram](SystemDesignAndArchitecture-SequenceDiagram.png)

The above sequence diagram demonstrates the design of a system and architecture for integrating applications in Sections 2 and 3. As shown in the diagram, the platform includes a verifier agent responsible for verifying investors' identities, which subsequently completes the KYC verification process.

When an investor registers on the platform, a connection invitation will be provided to the investor, and upon acceptance by the investor, the branch user will send a proof presentation request. The investor will then send the proof presentation, which will be verified by the verifier agent.

The above sequenc diagram can be view full screen [here](https://sequencediagram.org/index.html?presentationMode=readOnly#-XQWkqTVJMA6EBDCRc0fp2s5tqDCH04yrrpKwiNcjgKSYndZidlitic9wRiUfhywz4dQsKdDdT5GA1B5D4a4vsw17VpmwQpOQOaINQMj5JoxYSCmKwZgURSQMAeqIJQFQoWhhRZDhGb6gAosghLgPawHUl6PobvgW7eHeJHZHqsBvh+xikJQQLqvkUCqLgaAMsR2HAHeMHuDmGBDFsEimBmFzZoaeCEH0QSPMI4BkKoEKIKk-)
